org.apache.fop.afp

Class AFPStreamer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.fop.afp.AFPStreamer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Streamable

    public class AFPStreamer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Streamable
    Manages the streaming of the AFP output
